name: Apple
desc:
A crisp and sweet red apple, celebrated for its refreshing taste.
Great for snacking, baking, or adding to salads for extra flavor.
Rich in Vitamin C, it helps boost the immune system naturally.
Enjoy the crunchy, healthy delight that satisfies every bite.

name: Banana
desc:
Soft, sweet bananas packed with energy for an active lifestyle.
High in potassium, they support muscle function and heart health.
Perfect for breakfast, smoothies, or as a quick snack on the go.
A nutritious fruit that fuels your day with natural sweetness.

name: Orange
desc:
Juicy, flavorful oranges bursting with natural sweetness and zest.
Packed with Vitamin C to help strengthen the immune system.
Great for juicing or as a refreshing snack at any time of day.
A delicious way to stay hydrated and full of energy naturally.
